title: About
text:
Garrison-Reads is a blog that I started to keep account of the books that I have read and/or listened to. I often find myself seeking to remember various aspects of a previously read books, and needed something to catalog my thoughts and conculsions. Additionally, you will find a list of interesting vocabulary present in each entry.
Reach out to me if you’d like to discuss any of my reviews! :)

title: Guns, Germs, and Steel
text: Guns, Germs, and Steel; an account of the overtaking of some societies over others. Documenting the technology that led to the domination and subjugation seen throughout history, Jared Diamond inspects the disparate resources that existed between societal regions and climates. His fresh perspecitve of rational thinking is welcomed, and directly challenges old-racist ideas explaining technological differences between societies.
